While charau-ka are infamous for their brutality, some even frighten their own kind in their obsession with violence. These deadly butchers are well-versed in the art of inflicting vicious, bloody wounds on their enemies, and they consider anyone not charau-ka an enemy. A single taste of a foe's blood can grant one terrifying strength, as if the charau-ka butcher literally gains power from their victims' pain. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Charau-ka Butcher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1432) **Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 297 2.0, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 85 **Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_ --- **AC** 21 **Fort** +16 **Ref** +12 **Will** +13 **HP** 95 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Blood Fury** ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Trigger** The charau-ka butcher deals bleed damage to a creature; **Effect** The charau-ka licks blood from their weapon, becoming furious. They regain 5 Hit Points and gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of their turn. --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet **Melee** _trident_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d8+8 slashing **Melee** fist +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning **Ranged** _trident_ +16 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing **Ranged** thrown debris +15 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning **Mauler** While the charau-ka butcher is raging, their melee Strikes deal an additional 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). **Rage** As the [barbarian](/Classes.aspx?ID=2) class ability; AC 22, +9 Hit Points, +2 melee damage **Shrieking Frenzy** ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. While in the frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, due to their loud wailing. **Thrown Weapon Mastery** Any weapon a charau-ka throws gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. Furthermore, when a charau-ka throws an improvised weapon, they do not take the –2 penalty for doing so, nor does they take a penalty for using a thrown improvised weapon with the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to make a lethal attack.
name: Charau-ka Butcher
